page.title: 09VALERIE'S DAY AT SCHOOL
page.content: 7.30 am get changed and go down stairs and I have frosties for breakfast.Then after that I go into the bathroom to clean my teeth and wash my face. Then I go into my mums bedroom to brush my hair. Then I get my things ready for school. I go out of the house at 8.20 am. I get to school about 8.45 am. Lesons starts at 9.00 am. Monday,we have Mr Herford to take assembly. Wednesday, we go swimming. Friday, we have assembly in the afternoon. 10.35 am we go out to play. We come in at 11.oo am . We sometimes have ago on the computor while the rest have story. 12.00 pm we have dinner served by Mrs Todd, Mrs Kirkham, Mrs Morris,. We have two ladies who helps us with dinner and sandwiches. There names are Mrs Hartshcrne, and Mrs Swan,. We come in from play at 1.15 pm. On Tuesday we go out for games. 3.15 home
